caption.p: Principle component analysis (PCA) scores plot of the distribution of AVPs and Non-AVPs, where AVPs and Non-AVPs are represented by red and blue circles, respectively. ( a) and ( c) represent the distribution of amino acid composition and a new feature representation, respectively, obtained from the dataset T 544p+407n + V 60p+45n, while ( b) and ( d) represent the distribution of pseudo amino acid composition and a new feature representation, respectively, obtained from the dataset T 544p+544n + V 60p+60n.
